org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.local
Class IntervalThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.local.IntervalThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class IntervalThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Thread that encapsulates a java.lang.Runnable and repeatedly runs it in a defined interval.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Alexander Will, Sven Wende
